content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"II. Use Ethical and Legal Trade & Business Practices\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This Code points out some key laws and compliance principles, but does not address every law that applies to EPAM's business. It is impossible for you to know all aspects of all applicable laws, but you should understand the laws that apply to your work and responsibilities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a. Anti-Bribery & Anti-Corruption\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The rule here is simple — don't give or receive a bribe, or make any offer that appears to be a bribe to, anybody, anytime, for any reason.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bribery and corrupt practices are illegal and unethical, and can result in stiff fines and penalties for EPAM, as well as potential fines and imprisonment for the individuals involved. EPAM prohibits bribery and corruption, as do the laws of nearly every country, including the United States, through the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (\\\"FCPA\\\"), which prohibits bribery of government officials, and the United Kingdom, through the U. K. Bribery Act, which prohibits bribery of government officials as well as bribery in commercial transactions that do not involve government officials.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Not only do these laws prohibit giving something of value, directly or indirectly, to a government official improperly to influence official action, but some of these laws, including the FCPA, also require companies to keep accurate books and records, which includes the need to accurately record and document any gift or entertainment provided by an EPAM employee.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Don't offer, provide, promise or solicit bribes, provide other kickbacks, or promise or offer to pay or give anything else of value to influence the action of another person, company or a government official improperly or to obtain any other improper advantage. Even a simple favor or giving a business gift can trigger these laws and can be viewed as offering or giving something of value corruptly. Offering favors such as charitable donations, political contributions or job offers might be perceived as a bribe or kickback.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Make purchases and sales based on competitive pricing, quality and performance. Never request, directly or indirectly, or accept anything of value from anyone with whom EPAM does, or may potentially do, business, if the purpose is or could be perceived, to influence your action or to provide an unfair business advantage.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Having a third party engage in the illegal behavior instead of EPAM will not shield you or EPAM from a violation. Don't do something indirectly that EPAM cannot do directly, and only retain reputable third parties to support EPAM in accordance with EPAM policies.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It may not always be obvious when someone is viewed as a government official under the anti-bribery laws. For example, a purchasing manager of a company that happens to be owned by a government may be viewed as a governmental official. Also, offering anything of value to a relative of the government official, rather than directly to the official, may trigger these laws.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Certain business relationships and practices raise heightened concerns and require prior approval, such as:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Use of consultants or sales agents;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Commission payments;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Finder-fees;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Distributors/resellers;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Like-kind payments made to providers of business procurement services or distributors;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Joint ventures; and\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Joint-bidding consortiums.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Certain requests by customers, vendors, or other third parties EPAM interacts with also raise heightened concerns and require prior approval, such as:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Excessive discounts;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Excessive or non-market commissions;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Requests for the payment of sums in cash, offshore payments or payments to third parties; or \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any other request that is \\\"not quite right.\\\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You should conduct due diligence and screen third parties against the U. S. OFAC list and other country lists identified by EPAM using EPAM's screening processes and automated tools as set forth in EPAM's supporting policies and procedures. A business relationship or transaction that raises such heighted concerns may be permitted, but only upon securing prior approval and review in accordance with EPAM's policies.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b. Giving or Receiving Gifts & Entertainment\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Gifts, entertainment and other business courtesies are acceptable to promote goodwill or for a legitimate business purposes such as the promotion, demonstration or explanation of products or services. However, these courtesies also raise a number of risks for EPAM. Not only can such courtesies result in serious violations of law when certain precautions are not taken, but they can also violate the company policies of our clients and business partners. Gifts and entertainment that would reflect negatively on EPAM, should they become public, must be avoided. All gifts and entertainment on behalf of EPAM or any of its employees must be accurately documented in EPAM's financial records.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When providing or receiving gifts, entertainment or other gratuities or courtesies to or from persons, firms or corporations with whom EPAM does or might do business, you must ensure that they are:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Lawful;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Infrequent;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Modest items or reasonable in value;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In accordance with accepted business practices and the recipient's policies;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Provided for legitimate business purposes;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Not intended to, nor likely to be viewed as, improperly influencing a business decision; and\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Properly and accurately recorded in EPAM's books and records with supporting documentation.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Never give or receive:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When the value, cost or frequency could reasonably be interpreted as affecting an otherwise objective business decision, or\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cash or cash-equivalents (e.g., gift cards, debit cards, credit cards or gift certificates or things easily convertible to cash).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Additional restrictions may apply when providing gifts and entertainment to government officials and you should consult the Company's Anti-Bribery Policy when dealing with government officials.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Recreational entertainment and other business courtesies such as travel expenses and lodging are areas of high risk. Gifts and business courtesies even in the business context must be reasonable and have a legitimate business purpose.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The restrictions above also apply to family members of the recipient. Please consult EPAM's Compliance Officer for additional guidance on the above policy and any needed approvals.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c. Trade & Export Controls & Anti-Boycott\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Complex trade and export control laws limit where EPAM can send or receive EPAM's or EPAM's clients' products, services or technical information. These laws also control whether or not a particular individual or entity from a particular country can be provided access to it.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The definition of controlled products, services and technology is complex and broad. It is broader than military-use products, services or information. It can encompass commercial use products, services, information or technical data (such as encryption source code). Make sure to understand the specifics of the particular technology (such as the client's export control number for the technology or whether encryption source code is involved) and consult the Compliance Officer for assistance in determining whether export restrictions apply and how to comply.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It may be necessary for EPAM or its client or business partner to obtain an export control license from the government or to confirm with our client that client has done so and for EPAM to staff accordingly.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM also must comply with economic sanctions and embargoes that a country in which EPAM does business has adopted. As a company with headquarters in the United States, EPAM complies with economic sanctions and embargoes imposed against certain countries and individuals by the U.S. government. You should screen third parties against the U. S. OFAC list and other country lists identified by EPAM using EPAM's screening processes and automated tools as set forth in EPAM's supporting policies and procedures. Take care not to participate in international boycotts that are not sanctioned by the U.S. government.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d. Competition, Antitrust & Fair Dealing\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each employee, officer and director should endeavor to deal fairly with EPAM's customers, suppliers, competitors and employees. None should take unfair advantage of anyone through manipulation, concealment, abuse of privileged information, misrepresentation of material facts, or any other unfair-dealing practice.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Many countries have laws to promote and protect free and fair competition. The idea seems simple, but the laws and their application are complex and can be quite different from country to country. EPAM is committed to free and fair competition globally that is based on the value and quality of the products and services which EPAM offers in the marketplace.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One key theme is to protect against competitors agreeing to restrict competition. The following areas are likely to raise antitrust concerns:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Setting a price with a competitor,\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sharing sensitive competitive information with a competitor (e.g., costs, margins, prices) , or \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Allocating products, services, customers or markets between EPAM and any competitor.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The following areas could raise antitrust concerns if not handled carefully and with guidance from EPAM's legal counsel or Compliance Officer:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Entering into agreements with resellers on the terms of resale (e.g., resale price),\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Providing discounts or rebates to certain customers but not others, or \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Entering into exclusive relationships with suppliers, resellers, or customers.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"An agreement to restrict competition can even be inferred by conduct. Participating in trade associations and trade/industry conferences is generally pro-competitive, but you should exercise care when participating in these activities since by definition these are groups of competitors. Seek guidance from EPAM's legal counsel if it appears that improper matters are being discussed (such as prices, margins, costs, market allocations, etc.).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Another key theme is to protect against deceptive or unfair business practices. Deceptive practices and unfair methods of competition are also prohibited, such as:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Falsely disparaging a competitor or its products/services,\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Making marketing claims without factual support, or\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Making false or misleading claims about EPAM services or using another company's trademarks in a manner likely to confuse customers.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If there is an opportunity to take unfair advantage of a competitor's confidential information, or use confidential information of a former employer, do not do it. Competitive information and strategies are important to EPAM's business interests, and we pursue this vigorously without resorting to illegal or unethical means. In order for others to want to work with EPAM, they must be confident that EPAM will deal fairly and honestly with them and not take unfair advantage or engage in misrepresentation, concealment of important facts or fraud.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"e. Immigration\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM's continuous ability, and our clients' ability, to conduct business on a global scale with a world-wide mobile workforce depend on such compliance. Whenever you are involved in foreign travel or country relocation on behalf of yourself or others, undertake the necessary steps to comply with all the immigration laws.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"f. Insider Trading\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the course of performing your duties, you may become aware of non-public \\\"inside\\\" information regarding EPAM or EPAM's clients or business partners. Such inside information means any information that is not publicly known that could be used to influence an investor's decision to buy, sell or keep a security.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you use this information to buy or sell stock, or pass or tip the information to someone else who ends up buying or selling stock, this could be viewed as insider trading.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Insider trading is a serious violation of the law. Misusing or passing along such confidential information is also inconsistent with ethical conduct and the policies of EPAM's clients and business partners.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Such inside information should not be shared with anyone outside of EPAM (e.g., family, friends, journalists, financial analysts, customers, etc.). Even inside of EPAM, such inside information may only be shared internally if the EPAM recipient really needs the information to perform their job.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"g. Equal Opportunity and the Workplace\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM's goal is to provide an equal employment opportunity to all qualified personnel and applicants on a nondiscriminatory basis and a safe workplace free of unlawful discrimination, harassment and a hostile work environment. If you believe that you have been unlawfully harassed, or you become aware of unsafe workplace conditions, report the incident to your manager or Human Resources.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
